abstract: Rapid Results can help a village build a road in 100 days. But its larger goal is to show villagers they can do it themselves.
snippet: Rapid Results can help a village build a road in 100 days. But its larger goal is to show villagers they can do it themselves.
lead_paragraph: On Friday I wrote about Rapid Results Initiatives, bite-sized pieces of social change that a village, government office or business will choose and try to accomplish in just 100 days.   Rapid Results Initiatives have proven to be effective at various tasks: improving  health, infrastructure, education -  service delivery of any kind.  The urgent deadline provides focus.  It's no longer business as usual, plagued by the usual list of reasons why nothing gets done.

headline.main: Quick Change That Lasts for the Long Term
